constructorTitle3: Boost the activity of your followers
howItsWorksCardSettingsSubtitle: Register for our service and choose the rules of the game
howItsWorksCardPreviewSubtitle: Followers earn points for comments, mentions, and reactions in Stories.
howItsWorksCardBonusSubtitle: Points can be exchanged for discounts on products, blogger courses, consultations, checklists etc.
howItsWorksCardCalculateSubtitle: We automatically calculate the activity of participants in a blogger’s game and display the data in a table.
howItsWorksCardHonestySubtitle: The table can be linked to current Stories, where participants can check their scores 24/7.
howItsWorksCardMotivationSubtitle: Followers are motivated to comment, react, and share your stories and posts.
howItsWorksCardCoverageSubtitle: Increased activity will grow your reach and involve new subscribers in your content.
howItsWorksCardFeedSubtitle: Instagram Smart Feed will make your posts and stories the first thing your followers see.
howItsWorksCardExampleSubtitle: Watch how it works in a real example and learn the process in 2 minutes.
benefitsBloggerText1: Dozens of options for new games and activities
benefitsBloggerText2: Posts will reach TOP through #hastags and GEO-tags
benefitsBloggerText3: Points can be used as account currency
benefitsBloggerText4: Incentivize your audience with points to increase views
benefitsBloggerText6: Increase demand for products and services
benefitsSubscriberText1: Receive prizes for sharing, re-posting, commenting etc. in blog posts and live streams
benefitsSubscriberText2: Prizes are awarded to followers with the most points, not randomly decided
benefitsSubscriberText4: Points are accumulated and do not expire
benefitsSubscriberText5: Check your account quickly with 1 click to the link pinned in the Stories
benefitsSubscriberText6: Calculations of contest scores are completely transparent
benefitsSubscriberText7: Games can be joined at any time
safetySubtitle1: iGame is officially approved by Meta. Bans for using this service are excluded!
costSubtitle: Varies depending on the number of subscribers to your blog

contractPopup:
Contract of public offer for the provision of services on granting the right to use the Service igame.by

G. Minsk

PREAMBLE

Igame.by - constructor for increasing Instagram activity through gamification with users.

This agreement for the provision of non-exclusive rights to the Service igame.by (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") is offer and contains all the essential conditions stipulated by the current legislation of the Republic of Belarus.

The terms of this offer may be accepted by a person who intends to obtain non-exclusive rights to the service igame.by ("Licensee"), the rights to which belong to the sole proprietor Salauyou A. S. ("Licensor"), not otherwise than by joining the proposed the offer as a whole.

In order to avoid ambiguous interpretation, granting the rights to use the igame service.by, the Licensor does not provides the Licensee with any services, in particular, but not limited to, the Licensor does not provide services for providing technical, organizational, informational and other opportunities carried out with the use of information technologies and systems for the promotion, advertising of the client's products and the collection, processing and systematization of information about the client's customers.

Offer - this document, a public contract. The publication (placement) of the text of a public contract on information stands is a public offer (offer) addressed to a wide range of persons in order to provision of certain types of services (item 2. Article 407 of the Civil Code of the Republic of Belarus). A fact confirming the conclusion of a public agreements on the part of the Customer of services, is his payment - acceptance (paragraph 3 of Article 408 of the Civil Code of the Republic Belarus).

DEFINITIONS USED IN THIS AGREEMENT

1.1. Offer - a public offer of the Licensor, addressed to any person, to conclude this agreement with him Contract.

1.2. Acceptance - full and unconditional acceptance by the Licensee of the terms of the Contract.

1.3. Licensor - Sole proprietor Salauyou Aliaksandr Siarheevich who has concluded an Agreement with the Licensee on granting the right to use (a simple (non-exclusive) license) of the service igame.by

1.4. Licensee - a legal entity or individual who has concluded a Contract with the Licensor on the terms, contained in the offer.

1.5. A simple non-exclusive license is a non-exclusive right to use the igame service.by on the territory countries in which the Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic Works is in force, for own consumption, without processing and distribution rights.

1.6. License fee - the cost of the right to use (simple (non-exclusive) license) service igame.by.

1.7. Service - igame service.by, Service placement site igame.by

2. SUBJECT OF THE CONTRACT

2.1. Under this Agreement, the Licensor undertakes to grant the Licensee the right to use (simple (non-exclusive) license) of the igame service.by, and the Licensee undertakes to pay the Licensor the stipulated The remuneration contract. Description and the features of the Service are described on the website igame.by.

2.2. The Parties recognize the igame Service as the acceptance of this offer.by - registration of the Licensee in the Service on the website igame.by.

2.3. The date of acceptance is the date of registration of the Licensee in the Service

2.4. The Licensor does not grant the Licensee the right to use the Service owned by him to create a new result of intellectual activity.

2.5. At the time of acceptance of this offer, the Licensee confirms and agrees that the purchased Service It is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without any additional guarantees. Licensee confirms that the Service is being purchased at your own risk. The Licensor is not responsible for the inconsistency of the Service with subjective expectations The licensee.

3. THE PROCEDURE FOR USING THE SERVICE

3.1. The Licensee gets the right to use the Service in the following way:

3.1.1. Use the Service on the igame website.by via a web browser

4. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTIES

4.1. Licensor's rights.

4.1.1 The right to use the Service is granted with the Licensor retaining the right to issue licenses to others persons (non-exclusive license).

4.1.2. Terminate the Agreement and refuse to grant the Licensee the rights to use the Service in the event violations of the terms of payment by the Licensee, or on other grounds provided for in this Agreement.

4.1.3. Release new releases and versions of the Service.

4.1.4. Involve third parties to provide additional services under this Agreement.

4.1.5. Unilaterally amend this Agreement by publishing new editions and posting them on the website igame.by . The changes begin to apply to the relationship between the Licensor and the Software Licensee after 3 (three) working days days after the publication on the website of the new edition of the License Agreement-offer.

4.2. The rights of the Licensee.

4.2.1. Use the service in accordance with this agreement.

4.3. Obligations of the Licensee.

4.3.1. Use the Service only within the limits of those rights and in the ways provided for in this Agreement. The contract.

4.3.2. To make payments under this Agreement, in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.

4.3.3. To maintain the confidentiality of information, materials, documents that have become available to him within the framework of execution of this Agreement.

4.3.4. The Licensee is fully responsible for the safety of his credentials and for losses or other damage, which may arise due to unauthorized use of this information. Upon loss, unauthorized access to The Licensee has the right to send a request to the credentials or the possibility of such a situation To the Licensor to change the credentials. In this case, the Licensor, in agreement with the Licensee, performs blocking access to the credentials The licensee. The term of such blocking is agreed upon by the Parties additionally. In this case, the Licensor is not responsible responsibility for notifying any third parties of the temporary suspension of the Licensee's access to its information system and for possible consequences resulting from the absence of such notification.

4.3.5. To carry out other actions that are not expressly permitted in this Agreement or the current legislation of the Republic of Belarus.

4.3.6. Independently get acquainted with the official information from the Licensor, published in the order, provided for by this Agreement, as well as to monitor the introduction of new documents or changes already existing ones.

4.4. Obligations of the Licensor.

4.4.1. Grant the Licensee the right to use the Service within the limits stipulated by the Agreement. Provide the right to use the Service daily and around the clock, except for the time of preventive measures carried out not more than once a day.

4.4.2. To maintain the confidentiality of information, materials, documents that have become available to him within the framework of execution of this Agreement.

4.4.3. Properly publish official communications (documents) related to by granting the right to use the service igame.by.

5. LICENSE FEE

5.1. The license fee represents periodic payments (royalties) in hard cash. amount. The amount of the reward is indicated on the site igame.by

5.2. Payment for the use of the Service occurs on the terms of 100% prepayment

5.3. Payment of license periodic payments is made as follows:

5.3.1 By individuals in the ways indicated on the site igame.by.

5.4. The moment of fulfillment by the Licensee of payment obligations is the date of receipt of funds in in full to the account of the Licensor.

5.5. When transferring payment by the Licensee in a larger amount than the amount of the periodic payment, it is unnecessarily the amount paid is credited in advance in the period of subsequent periodic payments.

5.6. Within the framework of this Agreement, the Licensee may receive a full and (or) partial refund funds according to the rules of clause 5.7.

5.7. To return the funds, the Licensee sends a request to the e-mail address - info@igame.by.

5.7.1. The request must contain:

- Payment date and payment time.

- Details of the account from which the payment was made (indicating the bank card number). When refund funds are returned exclusively to the account from which the payment was made.

- Circumstances that caused the return.

At the same time, for the purposes of this Agreement, under circumstances that can be considered as grounds to consider the issue of returning funds to the Licensee, the circumstances of an insurmountable forces that the Licensee could not foresee at the time of acceptance of this offer, or the commission of unlawful actions by third parties.

5.7.2. The Licensee is advised that under no circumstances shall the funds be subject to return if:

- non-compliance of the purchased Service with the subjective expectations, ideas of the Licensee.

- acquisition of the Service and non-use of it by the Licensee in the absence of circumstances preventing its full use.

- the occurrence of other circumstances that arose through the fault of the Licensee, including actions committed intentionally and (or) by negligence.

5.7.3. If a decision is made to satisfy the Licensee's application for a refund transfer of funds by the Licensor is carried out from up to 90 calendar days.

5.7.4. Funds are returned only for unused days, taking into account the deduction of taxes and payment commission systems

5.8. The Licensor has the right to unilaterally change the amount of remuneration under this Agreement, by notifying the Licensee 5 (five) calendar days before the date of change, by amending this Agreement. Changes regarding the amount of remuneration do not apply to already paid periods using the service.

6. PAYMENT MECHANISM

6.1 Security:

6.1 Security:

6.1.1 All payments are made through the payment system BePaid.by

6.1.2 The payment page of the bePaid system meets all data transfer security requirements (PCI DSS Level 1). All confidential data is stored in encrypted form and is as resistant to hacking as possible. Access to authorization pages is carried out using a protocol that provides secure data transmission on the Internet (SSL/TLS)

6.1.3 At any time, you can link and unlink the payment card.

6.1.4 If your card supports 3-D Secure technology, your system will be asked to go through the cardholder verification procedure on the page of your bank (the bank that issued your card).

6.1.5 We accept payments by the following bank cards: Visa, Visa Electron, MasterCard, Maestro, Belcard, payment card Ya.Money, a virtual Ya card.Money.

6.1.6 Prices in dollars and Russian rubles are indicated for reference. Payment by Internet acquiring takes place in Belarusian rubles. Currencies of other countries are automatically converted into Belarusian rubles at the rate of the bank that issued your card. Due to this operation, the amount of the write-off may be higher than the stated amount.

6.2 Payment scheme:

6.2.1 The account is activated for a period of 30 days (with monthly payment) and 365 days (with annual payment) . The days start counting from the moment of payment.

6.2.2 After clicking on the “Pay” button You will be redirected to the secure page of the Bepaid payment system.by”

6.2.3 The order number and the payment amount will be indicated on the payment page. To pay, you need to enter your card details and confirm the payment by clicking the 'Pay' button.

6.2.4 If your card supports 3-D Secure technology, your system will be prompted to verify the cardholder on your bank's page.

6.2.5 After successful payment, you will receive a notification about account activation or service renewal. An electronic receipt confirming the payment will be sent to your E-mail.

6.2.6 You can disable your subscription at any time.

6.2.7 The money is debited 3 days before the end of the payment period.

6.2.8 On the payment page, you can find out the date of the next withdrawal of funds.

6.2.9 After each successful payment, an electronic receipt will be sent to your E-mail about successful payment and account renewal.

7. RESPONSIBILITY OF THE PARTIES

7.1. For non-fulfillment or improper fulfillment of obligations under this Agreement, the Parties are responsible in accordance with the Agreement and the current legislation of the Republic of Belarus.

7.2. In case of violation of the deadline for payment of the license fee (periodic payment), the right to use the Program is terminated for a period until the receipt of funds in the required amount.

7.3. The Licensor is not responsible for the Licensee's violation of the rights of third parties, including for the violation committed using the Service.

7.4. The Licensor is not responsible for the disclosure of information that arose through no fault of the Licensor or became necessary under the legislation of the Republic of Belarus at the request of authorized state bodies.

8. FORCE MAJEURE

8.1. Neither party is liable to the other party for non-fulfillment of obligations caused by circumstances that arose beyond the will and desire of the parties that cannot be foreseen or avoided, including failures of the Instagram social network, declared or actual war, civil unrest, epidemics, blockade, earthquakes, floods, fires and others natural disasters.

8.2. A party that cannot fulfill its obligations must notify the other party of the obstacle and its impact on the fulfillment of obligations under the Agreement within 5 (five) days from the moment of occurrence of these circumstances. The licensor has the right to provide this information by posting it on the website igame.by .

8.3. A Party that has not notified the other Party in a timely manner about the occurrence of force majeure circumstances is deprived of the right to refer to such in justification of non-fulfillment or improper fulfillment of the obligations assumed under this Agreement.

9. DISPUTE RESOLUTION PROCEDURE

9.1. All disputes and disagreements that may arise between the Parties on issues that have not been resolved in the text of the Agreement must be resolved through negotiations.

9.2. The Parties are obliged to comply with the claims procedure for dispute resolution. The term of consideration of the claim is 30 (thirty) calendar days from the date of receipt of the claim, unless another procedure for pre-trial settlement is established by the current legislation.

9.3. If disputes are not settled during negotiations, disputes arising from the Contract are resolved in court.

10. TERM OF THE CONTRACT. TERMINATION OF THE CONTRACT

10.1. The Contract comes into force from the moment of its acceptance in accordance with clause2.3.

10.2. The contract is concluded for an indefinite period.

11. TERMINATION OF THE CONTRACT

11.1 The Contract may be terminated prematurely:

11.1.1. By agreement of the Parties in the manner prescribed by law.

11.1.2. The Licensor has the right to unilaterally terminate the Agreement out of court in case of violation by the Licensee of the terms of this Agreement.

11.1.3. The Licensee has the right to refuse to use the Service at any time. At the same time, the funds written off as payment for the month in which the decision was made to refuse to use the Service are not subject to recalculation and partial refund.

12. LICENSOR'S DETAILS

privacyPopup:
Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the Policy) sets out the rules for the use of personal information information received from site users (hereinafter referred to as Users) by the site administrator igame.by (hereinafter referred to as the Company). This Policy privacy policy applies to all Users of the Site. All terms and definitions found in in the text The Policies are interpreted in accordance with the current legislation of the Republic of Belarus. Users expressly agree to the processing of their personal data data, as described in this Policy. The use of the Site means the expression by the User unconditional consent to the Policy and the specified conditions of information processing. The user should not use the Site if the User I do not agree with the terms of the Policy.

1. Personal information of Users processed by the Company

1.1. The Website collects, accesses and uses personal data for the purposes defined by the Policy Users, technical and other information related to Users.

1.2. Technical information is not personal data, it is analytical and static data concerning the health of the service igame.by.

1.3. The User's personal data means the information that the User provides Companies when filling out an application on the Site and then using the Site. Mandatory to provide Company information is marked with a special way. Other information is provided by the User at his discretion.

1.4. The Company may also process data made publicly available by the subject of personal data or subject to publication or mandatory disclosure in accordance with the law.

1.5. The Company does not verify the accuracy of the personal information provided by the User, and has no opportunities to assess his legal capacity. However, the Company assumes that the User provides reliable and sufficient personal information about yourself and keeps this information up to date.

2. Purposes of processing Users' personal information

2.1. Personal data authorized for processing under this Privacy Policy, provided by the User by filling out the registration form on the Website and include the following information:

2.1.1. User Name;

2.1.2. User's Instagram;

2.1.3. Email address (e-mail);

2.2. When registering on the Website and subsequent visits to the Company, the following are automatically transmitted personal data subject to mandatory protection:

2.2.1. IP address;

2.2.2. information from cookies. The user is informed that disabling cookies may result in inability to access parts of the Site that require authorization;

2.2.3. access time.

2.3. Any other personal information not mentioned above is subject to secure storage and non-proliferation, except as provided in clauses 3.4. and 3.5. of this Privacy Policy.

2.4. The collection of personal data of Users is carried out by the Company for the following purposes:

- Identification of the User registered on the Site for the conclusion of a License agreement-an offer on granting the right to use the service igame.by.

- Providing the User with access to a personalized resource igame.by

- Establishing feedback with the User, including sending notifications, requests concerning using the igame service.by, in order to improve the quality of the igame service offered.by, including troubleshooting technical problems or problems with security.

- Confirmation of the completeness of the personal data provided by the User.

- Processing and receiving payments.

- Providing the User with effective customer and technical support in case of problems, related to the use of the service igame.by.

- Providing the User with his consent, additional services, special offers, pricing information, newsletters and other information on behalf of the Company or on behalf of the Company's partners.

- Providing the User with access to the websites and (or) services of the Company's partners in order to obtain products, updates and services. - Conducting statistical and other research with mandatory depersonalization of data.

2.5. The Company uses technical information anonymously for the purposes specified in clause 2.4.

3. Conditions and methods of processing Users' personal information and its transfer to third parties

3.1. The User consents to the processing of his personal data by sending an application (any written request containing contact details).

3.2. Processing of the User's personal data means collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (update, modification), extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction of the User's personal data.

3.3. With respect to the User's personal information, its confidentiality is maintained, except in the following cases voluntary provision by the User of information about himself for general access to an unlimited circle faces.

3.4. The Company has the right to transfer the User's personal information to third parties in the following cases: The User has consented to such actions; The transfer is necessary to provide the User with additional services provided by partners The Company and the User have agreed to receive such services; Transfer to the authorized bodies the state authorities of the Republic of Belarus on the grounds and in accordance with the procedure established by law Of the Republic of Belarus; In order to ensure opportunities to protect the rights and legitimate interests of the Company or third parties in cases where the User violates terms of contracts and agreements with the Company, this Policy; As a result of the processing of personal information The user by its depersonalization received depersonalized statistical data, which are transmitted to a third party for carrying out research, performance of works or provision of services on behalf of the Company.

3.5. The User agrees that the Company has the right to transfer personal data to third parties, in in particular, courier services, postal communication organizations, telecommunication operators, solely for the purposes of proper execution of their obligations to the User under the Contract.

4. Obligations of the Parties

4.1. The User is obliged to:

4.1.1. Provide information about personal data necessary for the use of the Site and the purchase of rights use of the service igame.by.

4.1.2. Update, supplement the provided information about personal data in the event of a change in this information.

4.2. The Company is obliged to:

4.2.1. Use the information received exclusively for the purposes specified in Section 2 of this Policy confidentiality.

4.2.2. To ensure the storage of confidential information in secret, not to disclose without prior written permission of the User, as well as not to sell, exchange, publish, or disclose in other possible ways transmitted personal data of the User, except for the cases mentioned in clauses 3.4. and 3.5. of this Policy Confidentiality.

4.2.3. Take precautions to protect the confidentiality of the User's personal data according to the procedure usually used to protect this kind of information in the existing business turnover.

4.2.4. To block personal data related to the relevant User from the moment the User's request or request, or his legal representative or authorized body for protection right subjects of personal data for the period of verification, in case of identification of false personal data or illegal actions.

5. Measures applied to protect the User's personal information

5.1. The Company takes necessary and sufficient legal, organizational and technical measures to protect personal information of the User from unauthorized or accidental access, destruction, modification, blocking, copying, distribution, as well as from other illegal actions with it by third parties.

5.2. In case of loss or disclosure of Confidential Information, the Company is not responsible if this confidential information:

5.2.1. Became public domain before its loss or disclosure.

5.2.2. Was received from a third party prior to its receipt by the Company.

5.2.3. Was disclosed with the User's consent.

6. Dispute Resolution

6.1. All possible disputes arising from the relations regulated by this Policy are resolved in accordance with the procedure, established by the current legislation of the Republic of Belarus.

6.2. Compliance with the pre-trial (claim) dispute settlement procedure is mandatory.

7. Additional conditions

7.1. The Company has the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy without consent The user.

7.2. The new Privacy Policy comes into force from the moment it is posted on the igame website.by, unless otherwise not provided for by the new version of the Privacy Policy.

7.3. Continued use of the Site after making such changes confirms the User's consent to such changes.

costInfo: Prices in RUB and BYN are approximate. They are converted at the rate of nat. bank at the time of payment.
fullWorkPopup:
Turnkey setup

Don’t like to understand technical nuances?

No question. We will set everything up for you !


How it happens:

  1. We call on Zoom
  2. We discuss with you setting up the game based on your gamification strategy.
  3. Then you give us graphic materials for gifts.
  4. We set everything up and give you an account with the finished game.
  5. If necessary, we provide consultation on editing the settings.

Cost:

  • $99 for setting up and consultation
  • The service is paid separately
  • Payment in equivalent in Belarusian or Russian rubles at the national bank rate at the time of payment
fullSupportPopup:
Full support

Package for VIP clients.

Turnkey gamification.


How it happens:

  1. We call on Zoom
  2. We study your goals and objectives, which What would you like to gain from the use of gamification?
  3. We analyze the scope of your activity to choose the most effective strategy
  4. We prescribe a program for preparing a blog for the launch of the game
  5. We think through the best strategy for implementing gamification, based on your goals and objectives.
  6. We prescribe a gamification content plan for the launch period (up to 1 month)
  7. We set up the service and give you a ready-made account with the game
  8. We help in creating a competition post and Stories with the game conditions.
  9. If necessary, we provide consultation on editing the settings.
  10. After the game is launched, we monitor the game for a month and, if necessary, adjust the strategy for best efficiency .

Cost:

  • $599 one-time
  • Service is paid separately
  • Payment in equivalent in Belarusian or Russian rubles at the national bank rate at the time of payment
shopPopup:
Gift store

Make the issuance of gifts for points fully automatic.

How it happens:


  1. On the page for checking your points, you will have a new “Store” tab with a carousel of gifts.
  2. When a certain number of points is collected, a person will receive messages from the bot in direct message with a button to enter your store
  3. He will be able to make purchases for points without your participation. Points will be debited automatically.
  4. Information about receiving prizes or links to them will be sent to the participant directly to direct.
  5. If they buy a gift that requires your participation (for example, a personal consultation or a material prize), we will send a message about the winnings to your Telegram.

Functional:


  1. Cost:
    1. Uploading a photo of the gift
    2. Name of the gift
    3. Gift price in points
    4. Number of gifts
    5. Description of gifts
  2. Welcome message
    1. To purchase and authorize in the store, a participant in the game must collect the number of points that your cheapest gift costs. Then he will receive a message from the bot via Direct:

  3. Message about winnings

    1. For each gift you can create a unique message about winning.
    2. And immediately enter a link to the gift there (if a checklist or other information product is being played out)
    3. Or you can receive instructions on how to receive a gift.

  4. Notification of winnings

    1. If a gift is redeemed that requires your participation (for example, a personal consultation or a material prize), then we will send a notification of winnings to your Telegram.

  5. History of victories

    1. Game participants will be able to see (if you so decide) who, when and what bought in the store for points. And then there will be no doubt at all about the fairness of the competition :)

  6. Code word

    1. So as not to search for the button every time A person can receive a message with a code once a day using the code word that you set

  7. Editing during the game

    1. You can add and remove gifts, as well as edit their quantity and value in points right during the game.

Real example:

The work of the store using a real example can be seen here: https://igame.by/ page/al2ex_

Cost:

  • 19$/month
  • The service is paid separately
  • Payment in equivalent in Belarusian or Russian rubles at the national bank rate at the time of payment
fortunePopup:
Wheel of Fortune

is a game that motivates your subscribers to be active on the blog on a regular basis.


How it works:


  1. Stage 1: Calculations

    1. Start scoring points for comments in Reels, Posts, Stories, airwaves, and automatically reward for marking your profile.

  2. Stage 2: Gifts

    1. Add up to 15 gifts to the wheel of fortune and specify the number of each one. The probability of their loss will depend on this.

  3. Stage 3: Scroll price

    1. Specify the cost of scrolling the wheel in points. When this value is reached, we will generate a unique code for the participant.

  4. Stage 4: Anti-spam Direct

    1. Bot on the official API (secure) will send a message to the participant in Direct with a unique code and a button to scroll the wheel

  5. Stage 5: A moment of luck

    1. The participant goes to the points verification page with the code already entered (we will automatically substitute it) and turns the wheel.
  6. Stage 6: Victory message
    1. For each gift, you can write instructions on how to receive the prize, and we will automatically send it to the participant at the moment of victory.
  7. Stage 7: Full control
    1. Edit all settings, victory messages, Add new gifts and change their number right during the game.

Functional:


  1. Availability

    1. The wheel is right on the score verification page

  2. History of victories

    1. Participants will be able to see the winners in the entire history of the game. Reflects the integrity of the competition. It is turned on at will.

  3. Password protection

    1. The wheel can be scrolled only if there is a unique code that is generated when the participant reaches the required number of points. It is impossible to pick up the code!

  4. Gift list

    1. Participants will be able to see what the pictures in the wheel mean. And how many prizes are left in the roulette. The function is activated at will.

  5. Drawing points

    1. Don't know what to fill the wheel with? It doesn't matter! You can add a raffle of points to the main gifts. So that the participant is always satisfied and saves up for a new scrolling attempt
  6. Notifications
    1. Did the participant win a gift? We will immediately send an email to the telegram bot. We can notify you about the winnings of selected gifts :)
  7. Anti-spam Direct
    1. The participant does not need to clutter up your Yandex.Direct in order to spin the wheel idly. When the required number of points is reached, the bot will automatically send him a message with a code and a scroll button. You can edit it to your liking :)
  8. Editing settings
    1. You can add and remove gifts, as well as edit their number and the cost of scrolling right during the game.
  9. Security
    1. The functionality is built on the official API and approved by META. Any bans are excluded!

Real example:

  1. You can check the mechanics on our Instagram @igame2by
    1. Leave a reaction to any pinned Stories
    2. Leave any comment under the Wheel of Fortune post
    3. Get a button within 5 minutes to scroll the wheel in Yandex.Direct
    4. Scroll the wheel
    5. Check the prize in Yandex.Direct
  2. Start here: @igame2by

Cost:

  • 99$/month
  • The service is paid separately
